contents: Article 4 (Business) City/provincial sports councils carry out the following projects and activities to achieve the purpose of Article 2. Revised 2017. 3. 23., 2021. 10. 6. 1. Guidance and support for the projects and activities of city/provincial sports organizations and city/county/district sports associations that have joined the city/provincial sports council as members 2. City/provincial sports councils Hosting of various comprehensive sports competitions and international exchange within the province 3. Participation in various comprehensive competitions held by the Sports Council and hosting and supervising projects approved by the Sports Council 4. Cultivation of local athletes, coaches and workplace sports departments and promotion of research on competition techniques 5. Newly established projects related to the promotion of rights and interests of local athletes, welfare and education 2017. 3. 23. 6. Development of sports activities for all citizens and residents and distribution of life cycle sports programs 7. Support for activities of local sports clubs and sports enthusiast organizations 8 Promotion and linkage projects of local school sports (including youth sports activities), professional sports, and recreational sports 9. Installation, management, and operation of local sports facilities 10. Cultural projects such as discovery and dissemination of local sports history 11. City/provincial sports councils. 12. Profitable business to procure the necessary financial resources to carry out the business. Other business necessary to promote local sports and achieve the goals of the city/provincial sports association.
